page.title: 11Bracknell:People's Roots
page.content:
{ Bracknell}was built because London was overcrowded so another town was needeed to provide both housing and jobs. {Priestwood},where we live,is about 30 years old and was the first part to be built.We have done a survey in our class to find out where the children, and their parents and grandparents were born.Most children were born in{ {Ascot}at our local hospital,but a lot of parents and grandparents were born in{London.
Where people were born: Ascot London Elsewhere Children 72% 8% 20% Mothers 8% 44% 48% Fathers 0% 40% 60% Grandmas 2% 38% 60% Grandpas 4% 40% 56%
